font-lovers-lettering-brushes.name: Font Lovers Lettering Brushes

features.title: Pressure sensitive
features.description: Brush settings vary from pressure sensitive brushes perfect for faux-ligraphy, mono weight brushes, brushes perfect for sketching out your lettering.

features.title: Custom Lettering Brushes
features.description: Whatever style you’re inspired by or plan to bring to life, this comprehensive, diverse set will give you plenty of options to make it happen.

features.title: Beautiful Lettering Possibilities
features.description: If you love lettering, vectorizing your lettering or preparing your lettering for font making, this brush set was made for you!

features.title: Unique Strokes
features.description: Includes 20 brushes. These brushes were designed specifically for use in Procreate (not Illustrator or Photoshop), so they are only compatible with Procreate.

font-lovers-lettering-brushes.intro_description:
If you love lettering, vectorizing your lettering or preparing your lettering for font making, this brush set was made for you!

This custom Procreate lettering brush set includes 20 unique lettering brushes. 8 of those brushes were specifically designed for vectorization in Adobe Illustrator (check out the preview image above to see em in action!).

This pack is filled with 15 unique, metallic accented textures, each in 3 colorways for a total of 45 textures! 15 Isolated gold textures are also included to add a punch of shine to any colored or textured background. All ink and gold textures come as high res (300dpi) transparent pngs and are sized at least 2000px on their longest side. This makes them beautiful and crisp on all common print + web applications!

Here’s what’s included:

  • 20 unique lettering brushes
  • 8 of those brushes were specifically designed for vectorization in Adobe Illustrator
  • Pressure sensitive brushes perfect for faux-ligraphy

Brush settings vary from pressure sensitive brushes perfect for faux-ligraphy (check out the signature marker + jittery ink brushes!), to mono weight brushes (see the mono marker + round marker), to brushes perfect for sketching out your lettering (hello, pencil sketch and smooth pencil!). Whatever style you’re inspired by or plan to bring to life, this comprehensive, diverse set will give you plenty of options to make it happen.

——

To see more Procreate artwork using these brushes, find me on Instagram! https://instagram.com/everytuesday

You can also find me every Tuesday sharing a new design, Procreate or lettering tutorial on YouTube: https://youtube.com/everytues

If you’re new to Procreate, check out my free course, Procreate for Beginners! https://every-tuesday.com/procreate-for-beginners

——

Requirements:

  • iPad Pro
  • Apple Pencil
  • Procreate

These brushes were designed specifically for use in Procreate (not Illustrator, or Photoshop), so they are only compatible with Procreate. An Apple Pencil was used to create and test all of the brushes. For this reason, I’m unable to guarantee the same results with other 3rd party styluses. If you’d like to test some of my free brushes for compatibility, they can be found at http://TuesdayTribe.com

procreate-watercolor-lettering-brush-pac.name: Watercolor Lettering Brush Pack

images.alt: Unique color effects with procreate brushes

item.name: Procreate Watercolor Lettering Brush Pack: Extended

procreate-watercolor-lettering-brush-pac.intro_description:
Introducing Skinny Jeans: a fashion-forward font perfect for high impact headlines, energetic engagements and personality-driven branding, social media posts and messaging.

Skinny Jeans includes 3 fonts: a script style, all caps and symbols font. All styles were designed to pair perfectly together, for super quick layouts and eye-catching outcomes.

What’s included with the Skinny Jeans Font Trio:

  • round style paintbrush specifically for lettering
  • round paintbrush fine tuned for detailed illustration paintings
  • texturizer brush for integrating final watercolor details
  • watercolor bleed brush for creating beautiful, multicolored blends
  • semi-dry brush for creating painterly effects and distressing edges for a water-blended feel
  • damp brush for adding final watercolor paper details to your lettering
  • round splatter brush for final paint splatter details
  • bleed splatter brush for rough edged paint splatter details

With countless combinations, you have the freedom to create a unique watercolor lettering outcome that is entirely your own.

Get these brushes for free! The extended license of the full set of these brushes is included when you enroll in my online course, Watercolor Lettering in Procreate: https://every-tuesday.com/water-procreate

——

To see more Procreate artwork using these brushes, find me on Instagram! https://instagram.com/everytuesday

You can also find me every Tuesday sharing a new design, Procreate or lettering tutorial on YouTube: https://youtube.com/everytues

If you’re new to Procreate, check out my free course, Procreate for Beginners! https://every-tuesday.com/procreate-for-beginners

——

Requirements:

  • iPad Pro
  • Apple Pencil
  • Procreate

Installation instructions are available here: https://every-tuesday.com/watercolor-lettering-brushes-install

These brushes were designed specifically for use in Procreate (not Illustrator, or Photoshop), so they are only compatible with Procreate. An Apple Pencil was used to create and test all of the brushes. For this reason, I’m unable to guarantee the same results with other 3rd party styluses. If you’d like to test some of my free brushes for compatibility, they can be found at http://TuesdayTribe.com

seo.title: Procreate Watercolor Lettering Brush Pack: 8 unique watercolor brush effects
seo.desc: This custom procreate lettering brush set includes 8 unique brushes intended to create watercolor lettering effects. Bonus 4 high resolution watercolor paper textures included.

dreamy-ink-textures.name: Dreamy Ink Textures

images.alt: Unique packaging using Dreamy Ink Textures
Awesome background images with Dreamy Ink Textures
Stationary design using dreamy ink textures
Use ink textures on iPad in Procreate
Dreamy ink textures on transparent backgrounds png files

features.title: Works with Procreate
features.description: These textures can also be used as *transparent* pngs within Procreate! The full instruction guide for installing them on your iPad is available

features.title: 45 high res textures
features.description: All ink and gold textures come as high res (300dpi) transparent pngs and are sized at least 2000px on their longest side. This makes them beautiful and crisp on all common print + web applications!

features.title: Textures created by hand
features.description: Textures were meticulously edited to isolate gold accents and extensive time was spent removing their backgrounds in Photoshop. This helps them to appear as natural as possible so they can be used on different colored or textured backgrounds!

features.title: Gain increased views
features.description: Gain increased views on your physical and digital products, social media posts and online graphics with Dreamy Ink Textures!

dreamy-ink-textures.install_instructions:
Installing Textures

If you are using a desktop/laptop:

These textures can be used on desktops, laptops & tablets. When using them on a desktop or laptop computer, simply save the downloaded zip file after purchase to your hard drive. Unzip and place the file in your design program of choice.

If you are using a tablet:

Install Guide

Note: These textures are very high-rez, slower iPads may see some slower screen performance issues. If you are looking for a more optimized set for the iPad checkout the Watercolor Kit for Procreate.
dreamy-ink-textures.intro_description:
Gain increased views on your physical and digital products, social media posts and online graphics with Dreamy Ink Textures!

These dreamy textures were created by hand, one by one – many of them taking hours to complete. They were then meticulously edited to isolate the gold accents and extensive time was spent removing their backgrounds in Photoshop.

This pack is filled with 15 unique, metallic accented textures, each in 3 colorways for a total of 45 textures! 15 Isolated gold textures are also included to add a punch of shine to any colored or textured background. All ink and gold textures come as high res (300dpi) transparent pngs and are sized at least 2000px on their longest side. This makes them beautiful and crisp on all common print + web applications!

Here’s what’s included:

  • 15 unique metallic accented ink textures
  • 3 colorways for each texture = 45 textures!
  • 15 bonus isolated gold textures
  • All textures are transparent pngs, high res (300dpi), with the longest side at least 2000px

These textures can also be used as *transparent* pngs within Procreate! The full instruction guide for installing them on your iPad is available here: https://every-tuesday.com/install-ink-ipad

Please note: This is a large zip file (~560MB), so please allow extra time for the download to complete and insure you have a reliable internet connection before beginning the download.

seo.title: Dreamy Ink Textures: 45 unique, metallic accented textures
seo.desc: All ink and gold textures come as high res (300dpi) transparent pngs and are sized at least 2000px on their longest side. This makes them beautiful and crisp on all common print + web applications!

skinny-jeans.name: Skinny Jeans Font Trio

features.title: Script style
features.description: 27 ligatures and alternate, extra large looped y and g for more unique, hand lettered looks.

features.title: Symbols font
features.description: Over 50 unique, hand drawn doodles and illustrations. A different symbol is assigned to ever uppercase and lowercase standard character, plus numbers 0-9.

features.title: Multilingual support
features.description: Western European Languages for both Script + Caps styles. A full font previewer is available here for testing any characters.

features.title: Webfont available
features.description: For uses of Skinny Jeans that *are* intended for sale or to be used for business purposes, please see the Extended License, which also includes the Skinny Jeans webfonts.

skinny-jeans.intro_description:
Introducing Skinny Jeans: a fashion-forward font perfect for high impact headlines, energetic engagements and personality-driven branding, social media posts and messaging.

Skinny Jeans includes 3 fonts: a script style, all caps and symbols font. All styles were designed to pair perfectly together, for super quick layouts and eye-catching outcomes.

What’s included with the Skinny Jeans Font Trio:

  • A Script style with 27 ligatures and alternates, extra large looped y and g for more unique, hand lettered looks
  • An all caps style designed to pair perfectly with Skinny Jeans Script
  • A symbols font with over 50 unique, hand drawn doodles and illustrations. A different symbol is assigned to ever uppercase and lowercase standard character, plus numbers 0-9.
  • All symbols are included as an ai + eps file for versions of Adobe Illustrator, CS3 or newer for your convenience

Multilingual support is included for Western European Languages for both Script + Caps styles. Please test your characters in the font previewer below before purchase.

OTFs of each style are included for the full font trio. (Need access to TTFs? There’s a link included in the info text file)

  • For more inspiration, check out my instagram! https://instagram.com/everytuesday
  • For free weekly design tutorials, online courses, design freebies and goodies, head over to my blog, https://every-tuesday.com

Enjoy!

seo.desc: Skinny Jeans includes 3 fonts: a script style, all caps and symbols font. All styles were designed to pair perfectly together, for super quick layouts and eye-catching outcomes.
